abilities.name: Innate Spellcasting.
abilities.description:
Zuggtmoy's spellcasting ability is Charisma. She can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:
* At will: detect magic, locate animals or plants, ray of sickness
* 3/day each: dispel magic, ensnaring strike, entangle, plant growth
* 1/day each: etherealness, teleport

abilities.name: Legendary Resistance
abilities.description: If Zuggtmoy fails a saving throw, she can choose to succeed instead.

abilities.name: Magic Resistance.
abilities.description: Zuggtmoy has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.
